headline.main: NEW 'BUNDLES' UNIT WELCOMED BY KNOX; Secretary Declares Bluejacket Division Aids Our Navy Too

abstract: Bundles for Brit new div, Bundles for Blue-jackets, to aid Brit fleet sailors; group endorsed by Sec Knox
snippet: Bundles for Brit new div, Bundles for Blue-jackets, to aid Brit fleet sailors; group endorsed by Sec Knox...
